2. The owner of the cat is either to the left or right of the person drinking sprite. Since the cat owner is on the far left, the cat cannot be in the first row. Also, since the snake owner is to the right of the fanta drinker, fanta cannot be in the second column either. So, sprite cannot be in the second row.

3. The person drinking juice is on the right of the person drinking hot-chocolate. Since the snake owner is to the right of the fanta drinker, fanta cannot be in the third column. So, juice cannot be in the third row.

4. The person drinking sprite is on the left or right of the person drinking fanta. Since we have already placed the snake owner to the right of the fanta drinker, sprite must be to the left of fanta.

5. The owner of the goat is the person drinking juice. Since juice cannot be in the third row, goat must be in the fourth row.

6. The person drinking fanta is on the left or right of the owner of the bird. Since we have already placed the snake owner to the right of the fanta drinker, fanta must be in the fifth column and the bird owner must be in the fourth column.

7. The owner of the cat is on the far left. Since we have already placed the cat, it must be in the first row.

8. The owner of the goat is on the far right. Since we have already placed the goat, it must be in the fourth row.

9. The person drinking iced-tea is on the far left or far right. Since the cat and goat are already placed on the far left and far right respectively, iced-tea must be in the first or sixth column. However, since the person drinking sprite is to the left of the person drinking fanta, sprite cannot be in the sixth row, so iced-tea cannot be in the sixth column. So, iced-tea must be in the first column.

10. The person drinking hot-chocolate is on the right of the owner of the bird. Since the bird owner is in the fourth column, hot-chocolate must be in the fifth row.

11. The owner of the goat is on the left or right of the owner of the pony. Since the goat is already placed on the far right, the pony must be in the third column.

12. The person drinking fanta is on the left or right of the owner of the bird. Since the bird owner is in the fourth column, fanta must be in the third column.

Now, let's put the final solution:
